statements: DELETE FROM TVShowSchedule WHERE show_title = 'Game of Thrones';
DELETE FROM TVShowSchedule WHERE show_id = 101 AND air_date = '2022-06-15';
DELETE FROM TVShowSchedule WHERE air_time >= '18:00:00' AND air_date <= '2022-06-30';
